reviewText: This has a lot of footage I have never seen anywhere else. Very nicely done.
Video quality is poor but contents are really good
Nice vintage bicycle racing with some insight into Eddy. The film footage was great to see. We would have liked more training and racing strategy details.
wow watch this if you love biking, really great film about what it was like when these guys did it the hard way
Great set of DVD's. Highly recommended for the hard core cyclists.

I enjoyed every second of the video, Eddy Merckx, will always be one of my favorites cycling heroes, I would recommend this DVD to everyone who is interested in the sport, those guys were true racers, competing year round day after day, not like the modern day cyclist who are tailored to compete in specific races.

Bought this DVD being a huge fan of old school cycling,This DVD is gold,the Giro with retro cool music and that cool 1970s photograghy is something that gives you goose bumps!! Anyone that loves that golden age of bike racing should buy this DVD.

great dvd that allows you into the everyday world of this historic cyclist. Merckx is by far my favorite cyclist and for those of you who only know the name Armstrong I urge you to check into this cyclist who, if he had been in his prime at the same time Armstrong was, well, we could have seen some very different Tours.
